data.author: Chris Lalancette
data.message:
Rename major() and minor() methods.

Certain version of glibc on Linux use a macro for the device
major and minor numbers.  When that happens, it directly conflicts
with the name of these methods and causes a build failure.
Sidestep the whole issue by renaming the methods here to
"majorNum" and "minorNum".

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@openrobotics.org>

data.author: Mark Horn
data.message:
Install udev rule as part of Debian pkg install (#28)

Instead of requiring the user of the package to run a script, have
the udev rule installed as part of the package.

The udev will be installed as
    /lib/udev/rules.d/60-ros-<rosdistro>-kobuki-ftdi.rules
If more than one ROS distribution is installed on the same system,
the older distribution udev rules file will be used as the :=
operator is used.
See: https://www.kernel.org/pub/linux/utils/kernel/hotplug/udev/udev.html

Additional References:
    http://www.reactivated.net/writing_udev_rules.html
    http://manpages.ubuntu.com/manpages/xenial/man1/dh_installudev.1.html

Implements issue #139. Power system events:
 - plug/unplug to the docking base or adapter
 - transitions to low/critical battery levels
 - battery charge completed

When plug/unplugged we generate "phantom" battery full event due to
issue #137. They should disappear as we implement it.
